title: Parental Controls: Web Content Filter (com.apple.familycontrols.contentfilter)
description: Parental Controls: Web Content Filter settings

restrictWeb.title: Limit access to websites
restrictWeb.description: Set to true to enable Web content filters.

whitelistEnabled.title: Enable site allowlist
whitelistEnabled.description: Set to true to use the filterWhiteList and filterBlackList lists.

siteWhitelist.title: Site Allowlist
siteWhitelist.description: If specified, this key contains an array of dictionaries that define additional allowed sites besides those in the automated list of allowed and unallowed sites, including disallowed adult sites.

useContentFilter.title: Use built in content filter
useContentFilter.description: Set to true to try to automatically filter content.

filterWhitelist.title: Content Filter Allowlist
filterWhitelist.description: If specified and restrictWeb is true, an array of URLs designating the only allowed Websites.

filterBlacklist.title: Content Filter Backlist
filterBlacklist.description: If specified and restrictWeb is true, an array of URLs of Websites never to be allowed.
